Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have been experiencing gradual hair thinning over the past two years.
Have you noticed any changes in your skin, nails, or any other parts of your body?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my skin, nails, or any other parts of my body.
What is your age and gender?
I am a 54-year-old woman.

No, I haven't had any recent changes in my diet, stress levels, or hormonal changes such as menopause.

Yes, my mother also experienced hair thinning starting in her 50s.

No, I haven't been using any new hair care products or treatments.
**Final Diagnosis:** Female pattern hair loss (androgenetic alopecia)
